PackageOracle.name: DA_ORG_ADS_SOURCE_FTA_XREF
PackageOracle.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE CHTR.DA_ORG_ADS_SOURCE_FTA_XREF
/* Generated on 20-JAN-15 03.40.05.468200000 PM -06:00 */
AS

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,fta_cd IN VARCHAR2
,billing_station_id IN NUMBER
,party_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,fta_cd IN VARCHAR2
,billing_station_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

END da_org_ads_source_fta_xref;

body.name: DA_ORG_ADS_SOURCE_FTA_XREF
body.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE BODY CHTR.DA_ORG_ADS_SOURCE_FTA_XREF
/* Generated on 20-JAN-15 03.40.05.477925000 PM -06:00 */
AS

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,fta_cd IN VARCHAR2
,billing_station_id IN NUMBER
,party_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_org_ads_source_fta_xref.add, parms=' || fta_cd || '|' || billing_station_id || '|' || party_id || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_org_ads_source_fta_xref a
(
a.fta_cd
,a.billing_station_id
,a.party_id
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
)
VALUES
(
add.fta_cd
,add.billing_station_id
,add.party_id
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
);
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_org_ads_source_fta_xref.add');

END add;

PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,fta_cd IN VARCHAR2
,billing_station_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_org_ads_source_fta_xref.del, parms=' || fta_cd || '|' || billing_station_id || '|' || audit_user || '|');
UPDATE chtr.t_org_ads_source_fta_xref a
SET a.record_stat = 'D'
,a.modified_dttm = SYSTIMESTAMP
,a.modified_by = del.audit_user
WHERE a.fta_cd = del.fta_cd
AND a.billing_station_id = del.billing_station_id
;
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_org_ads_source_fta_xref.del');

END del;

END da_org_ads_source_fta_xref;
